easy.q: I have 4 legs but I do not walk. I come in a set of four and I hold things steady. What am I?
easy.hint: Think of furniture that helps you sit or hold a table.

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: When you add two letters to me, you get a word meaning not many.

hard.q: A boy starts with 9 coins. He spends some, then earns the same amount back, ending with twice the amount he began. How many did he spend (and earn back) if he ends with 18 coins?
hard.hint: Let the spent amount be x; after spending and then earning x, total becomes 2*(start) = 18.
